sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; function About() { return (

About

You may not know this, but you basically already know Inkling. Inkling is a programming language that allows you to follow your gut. Do what makes sense to you while learning how to shift your thinking to become a better programmer and thinker. The language works to let you speak the language you code.

When the inkling team first met, we had a purpose. Each of us remembers the first time we learned to code. We all began with different languages- some Java, some Python, some C++, and more. While these languages are all great languages with special utilities, we wanted to create a language that would ease new computer scientists into programming to gain a strong foundation in coding. We drew upon our personal experiences as beginner programmers to build a language that was intuitive. Our goal is to encourage you to strengthen your skills and grow as a programmer with an intuitive beginner language. Why? Because you can.

Type what you want to say. Where will your inkling take you today?

); } export default About;
